page.title: 08INDUSTRY , CHEMICALS
page.content: Titanium Dioxide pigment is manufactured in Europe's first chloride process plant by S.C.M. The plant is the biggest pigment producer in Europe and satisfies the paint and plastic industry need in Europe, Africa and the Middle East. Raw materials used are : Rutile (FeTiO3), Sulphuric Acid (H2SO4), Caustic Soda (NaOH), Chlorine, Coke and Gas. Basic materials are first converted to titanium tetrachloride, which is 99.9% pure. This is then converted by Oxidisation to titanium dioxide.This is then milled and classified, washed, spray dried, micronised and packed for distribution. TiO2 is necessary for fast non run colour.
